an5.166:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi …pe…
an5.166:1.2: “idhavuso, bhikkhu silasampanno samadhisampanno pannasampanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:1.4: No ce dittheva dhamme annam aradheyya, atikkammeva kabalikaraharabhakkhanam devanam sahabyatam annataram manomayam kayam upapanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:2.1: Evam vutte, ayasma udayi ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an5.166:2.2: “atthanam kho etam, avuso sariputta, anavakaso yam so bhikkhu atikkammeva kabalikaraharabhakkhanam devanam sahabyatam annataram manomayam kayam upapanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:3.1: Dutiyampi kho …pe… tatiyampi kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an5.166:3.2: “idhavuso, bhikkhu silasampanno samadhisampanno pannasampanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:3.4: No ce dittheva dhamme annam aradheyya, atikkammeva kabalikaraharabhakkhanam devanam sahabyatam annataram manomayam kayam upapanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:4.1: Tatiyampi kho ayasma udayi ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an5.166:4.2: “atthanam kho etam, avuso sariputta, anavakaso yam so bhikkhu atikkammeva kabalikaraharabhakkhanam devanam sahabyatam annataram manomayam kayam upapanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:5.2: “yavatatiyakampi kho me ayasma udayi patikkosati, na ca me koci bhikkhu anumodati.
an5.166:5.4: Atha kho ayasma sariputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
an5.166:5.5: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an5.166:5.6: “idhavuso, bhikkhu silasampanno samadhisampanno pannasampanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:5.8: No ce dittheva dhamme annam aradheyya, atikkammeva kabalikaraharabhakkhanam devanam sahabyatam annataram manomayam kayam upapanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:6.1: Evam vutte, ayasma udayi ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an5.166:6.2: “atthanam kho etam, avuso sariputta, anavakaso yam so bhikkhu atikkammeva kabalikaraharabhakkhanam devanam sahabyatam annataram manomayam kayam upapanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:7.1: Dutiyampi kho …pe… tatiyampi kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an5.166:7.2: “idhavuso, bhikkhu silasampanno samadhisampanno pannasampanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:7.4: No ce dittheva dhamme annam aradheyya, atikkammeva kabalikaraharabhakkhanam devanam sahabyatam annataram manomayam kayam upapanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:8.1: Tatiyampi kho ayasma udayi ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an5.166:8.2: “atthanam kho etam, avuso sariputta, anavakaso yam so bhikkhu atikkammeva kabalikaraharabhakkhanam devanam sahabyatam annataram manomayam kayam upapanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:9.2: “bhagavatopi kho me sammukha ayasma udayi yavatatiyakam patikkosati, na ca me koci bhikkhu anumodati.
an5.166:9.4: Atha kho ayasma sariputto tunhi ahosi.
an5.166:10.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam udayim amantesi:
an5.166:10.2: “kam pana tvam, udayi, manomayam kayam paccesi”ti?
an5.166:10.4: “Kim nu kho tuyham, udayi, balassa abyattassa bhanitena.
an5.166:11.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
an5.166:11.2: “atthi nama, ananda, theram bhikkhum vihesiyamanam ajjhupekkhissatha.
an5.166:11.3: Na hi nama, ananda, karunnampi bhavissati theramhi bhikkhumhi vihesiyamanamhi”ti.
an5.166:12.2: “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silasampanno samadhisampanno pannasampanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:12.4: No ce dittheva dhamme annam aradheyya, atikkammeva kabalikaraharabhakkhanam devanam sahabyatam annataram manomayam kayam upapanno sannavedayitanirodham samapajjeyyapi vutthaheyyapi—
an5.166:12.7: Idam vatvana sugato utthayasana viharam pavisi.
an5.166:13.1: Atha kho ayasma anando acirapakkantassa bhagavato yenayasma upavano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam upavanam etadavoca:
an5.166:13.4: Anacchariyam kho, panetam avuso upavana, yam bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito etadeva arabbha udahareyya yatha ayasmantamyevettha upavanam patibhaseyya.
an5.166:13.6: Atha kho bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena upatthanasala tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi. Nisajja kho bhagava ayasmantam upavanam etadavoca:
an5.166:14.1: “Katihi nu kho, upavana, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca”ti?
an5.166:14.2: “Pancahi, bhante, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca.
an5.166:14.4: Idha, bhante, thero bhikkhu silava hoti …pe… samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu;
an5.166:14.6: kalyanavaco hoti kalyanavakkarano poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya;
an5.166:14.7: catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi;
an5.166:14.9: Imehi kho, bhante, pancahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca”ti.
an5.166:15.2: Imehi kho, upavana, pancahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca.
an5.166:15.3: Ime ce, upavana, panca dhamma therassa bhikkhuno na samvijjeyyum, tam sabrahmacari na sakkareyyum na garum kareyyum na maneyyum na pujeyyum khandiccena paliccena valittacataya.
an5.166:15.4: Yasma ca kho, upavana, ime panca dhamma therassa bhikkhuno samvijjanti, tasma tam sabrahmacari sakkaronti garum karonti manenti pujenti”ti.
